lead_paragraph: Proposed reforms to soccer's scandal-plagued governing body FIFA would leave power still in the hands of national associations and conferderations, shutting out players, fans and clubs, the world players' union said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: FIFA Reforms Could Make Situation Worse: Players' Union
headline.main: FIFA Reforms Could Make Situation Worse: Players' Union

snippet: Proposed reforms to soccer's scandal-plagued governing body FIFA would leave power still in the hands of national associations and conferderations, shutting out players, fans and clubs, the world players' union said on Wednesday....
